sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.DynamicSchedulingConfigTaskTables</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>DynamicSchedulingConfigTaskTables</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DynamicSchedulingConfigTaskTables = Class.create();
DynamicSchedulingConfigTaskTables.prototype = {
	tableList : [],
	tableMap : {},
	
    initialize: function() {
    },
    
    process: function() {
		var smConfigGR = new GlideRecord("sm_config");
		smConfigGR.addActiveQuery();
		if(smConfigGR.canRead()){
		smConfigGR.query();
		while(smConfigGR.next()){
			var main_table = (new sn_sm.SMConfiguration()).getParentTable(smConfigGR);
			var task_table = (new sn_sm.SMConfiguration()).getTaskTable(smConfigGR);
			this.tableMap[main_table] = 1;
			this.tableMap[task_table] = 1;
		}
		
		}
		else{
			gs.error(gs.getMessage("DynamicSchedulingConfigTaskTables:Security check failed. sm_config"))
		}
		return Object.keys(this.tableMap);
    },
	
    type: 'DynamicSchedulingConfigTaskTables'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-01-31 01:16:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>223e4bc7c32032001c845cb981d3ae2b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DynamicSchedulingConfigTaskTables</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Dynamic Scheduling" source="com.snc.dynamic_scheduling">88cb5ebf4722c210cd4e1ce4316d43f3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_223e4bc7c32032001c845cb981d3ae2b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-11-03 20:25:39</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
